text: Kenn is a great instructor, be sure to take your WSET level 2 and 3 classes with him! Thoroughly enjoyed being a student here, location is also 7 minutes walk away from Old Airport Road where you can get some yummy food during the lunch break. Contact Eyleen to enquire about the classes!
Superb experience. Did the WSET 2 - and both the instructor Kenn and the Admin officer Eyleen were amazing! Really enjoyed the experience. Thank you!
